mapper.select: SELECT B.CUST_ID,B.NAME,H.NRIC,B.TEL_M1,A.SALES_ORD_NO,E.STK_CODE, E.STK_DESC, CASE WHEN (A.APP_TYPE_ID = 66) THEN A.MTH_RENT_AMT ELSE A.TOT_AMT END AS FEE_AMT, CASE WHEN (A.APP_TYPE_ID = 66) THEN C.OBLIGT_PRIOD ELSE 0 END AS OBLIGATION_PERIOD, A.CUST_ADD_ID, F.ADDR_DTL || F.STREET ||','|| G.AREA ||','|| G.POSTCODE ||','|| G.CITY ||','|| G.STATE ||','|| G.COUNTRY AS ADDR_DTL, CASE WHEN (A.BNDL_ID IS NULL) THEN 'HA' ELSE 'HC' END AS PROD_CAT, CASE WHEN (A.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 OR A.APP_TYPE_ID = 7759) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS RENTAL FROM SAL0001D A JOIN SAL0027D B ON B.CUST_CNTC_ID = A.CUST_CNT_ID JOIN SAL0029D H ON H.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0081D C ON A.SRV_PAC_ID = C.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID JOIN SAL0002D D ON A.SALES_ORD_ID = D.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SYS0026M E ON E.STK_ID = D.ITM_STK_ID JOIN SAL0045D I ON I.SALES_ORD_ID = A.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0023D F ON F.CUST_ADD_ID = I.ADD_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0064M G ON G.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{salesOrdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CBT0007M ( ID, CALL_ENTRY_ID, SALES_ORD_ID, SALES_ORD_NO, CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, TEL_NO, NRIC, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_MODEL, MTH_RENT_AMT, CONTRACT_PERIOD, CUST_ADD_ID, ADDR_DTL, TNC_FLAG, TNC_FILE_NAME, STUS_CODE_ID, CRT_DT ) VALUES( #{seq}, #{callEntryId}, #{salesOrdId}, #{salesOrdNo}, #{custId}, #{custName}, #{telNo}, #{nric}, #{productImage}, #{productModel}, #{mthRentAmt}, #{contractPeriod}, #{custAddId}, #{addrDtl}, #{tncFlag}, #{tncFileName}, 1, SYSDATE )
